wikipedia_page.main: Sir Stephen Edward De Vere, 4th Baronet (26 July 1812 – 10 November 1904) was an Anglo-Irish Member of Parliament in the nineteenth century.

link_mentions.page: List of political families in the United Kingdom
response: ****Sir Stephen de Vere, 4th Baronet (1812–1904), MP for Limerick County (1854–1859), High Sheriff of County Limerick (1870), nephew of the 1st Baron
*Stephen de Vere (1812–1904), an Irish Member of Parliament
*Stephen de Vere (1812–1904), MP, poet and philanthropist (de Vere Hunt)

link_mentions.page: Sir Stephen Edward De Vere, 4th Baronet

response: Monsell's great uncles were Sir Aubrey de Vere and Sir Stephen de Vere.Burke's Irish Family Records, ed. Hugh Montgomery-Massingberd, 1976, p. 258 In 1902 the family moved to Chelsea.
